definition[0]: an en suite bathroom is joined onto a bedroom
example[0]: Both bedrooms have en suite bathrooms.
definition[1]: an en suite bedroom has a bathroom joined onto it
definition[2]: a bathroom that is joined onto a bedroom, especially in a hotel
example[2]: Each room has an ensuite and a balcony.
definition[3]: a bedroom that has a bathroom joined onto it, especially in a hotel
example[3]: All the en suites have a log fire and a private garden or terrace.
